titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Sibley and Wixom family papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Judson Sibley was an Oakland County, Michigan businessman with various interests, including produce, lumber and coal. He was partner with Willard Wixom in the produce business.
archdesc.scopecontent: Letters, photographs, and other materials of Judson Sibley, Sibley family members, Willard Wixom and members of his family; some materials relate to the village of Wixom in Oakland County; business letterbook of Wixom and Sibley, 1885-1899; photographs; biographical and genealogical materials; and miscellaneous.

did.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

c01.scopecontent: Letters, photographs, and other materials of Judson Sibley, Sibley family members, Willard Wixom and members of his family; some materials relate to the village of Wixom in Oakland County; business letterbook of Wixom and Sibley, 1885-1899; photographs; biographical and genealogical materials; and miscellaneous.

did.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

c01.scopecontent: Group portraits of members of Albion College fraternities, probably including member of the Sibley or Wixom family; also photo of the treasurer's office, Oakland County, Michigan (1904); and portrait of Harold A. Sibley, University of Michigan student.
